peril.views.slick.components

Class MiniMap

  • java.lang.Object
    • peril.views.slick.util.Viewable
      • peril.views.slick.util.Clickable
        • peril.views.slick.components.MiniMap
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Component

    public final class MiniMap
extends Clickable
implements Component
    This class models a MiniMap that will display the entirety of the ModelBoard and will allow the user to move around their view of the ModelBoard.
    Since:
    2018-03-07
    Version:
    1.01.03
    Author:
    Ezekiel_Trinidad, Joshua_Eddy
    See Also:
    Clickable, Component, MiniMap.Window

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      private class  MiniMap.Window
      Models a window that pans around the MiniMap.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private SlickBoard board
      The SlickBoard that the MiniMap navigates.
      private org.newdawn.slick.Image boardImage
      The Image of the board on screen.
      private GameController game
      The GameController that allows the MiniMap to query the state of the game.
      private static int HEIGHT
      The height of the MiniMap.
      private int screenHeight
      The height of the screen.
      private int screenWidth
      The width of the screen.
      private static int WIDTH
      The width of the MiniMap.
      private MiniMap.Window window
      The MiniMap.Window that appears over the MiniMap.
      private org.newdawn.slick.Image windowBorder
      The border around the MiniMap.
